head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PIKE, ELEANOR R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PIKE, ELEANOR R.

block.p: PIKE-Eleanor R. On May 4, 2000. Beloved wife of Seymour Pike. Dear mother of Carl and (Ellen) Pike. Cherished grandmother of Jill and William. In lieu of flowers contributions can be made to NYU Med Center, Dept. of Rehabilitation Medicine, Attn: Dr. Mathew Lee, 400 East 34 St, NYC 10016. Services Sunday, May 7, 4:00 PM at ''The Riverside'' 76th St. & Amsterdam Ave.
